title: Novel Marketing: Making Your Author Brand Work for You & Your Books
description: To sell books, you need to market your fiction. But you don't want to do marketing if you come off like a smarmy used-car salesperson. When should you start building your fiction marketing platform? ASAP! What is the best way to market your fiction? Relationship and content marketing with a consistent author brand to your target audience, the readers most likely to love your books.K. Larking, with a marketing degree with a minor in English, will tell you how to do novel marketing right so you can keep writing.
author: Kate Larking
